> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight didnt say anything, but she looked very sad. She was confused
> about Dark Rodimus, even though he showed parts of the REal Rodimus, every
> moment he acted like an stranger. That Confused her more and more.

<NEW>

DARK RODIMUS watched NIGHTLIGHT almost longingly, his optics seeming
to drink in her shape and form, all the little colors and hues. He sat
in his chair wide legged, his hands resting easily on his thighs.

"You're finding it difficult to be here." DARK RODIMUS' voice was
matter-of-fact. "All I want is for you to be happy." He voice was
gruff, like he was trying to sound tough, yet there was something in
it anyway, a level of concern for NIGHTLIGHT. "We don't have to be
with the Maximals to be happy."

(TAG)

Preston
